title: Fork GENESIS10000+ as Separate Project
features: All GENESIS modules in parallel development
benefits: No risk to OrionKernel, parallel innovation, clean separation
phi_reflection: Separation. Zwei Wege. OrionKernel bleibt rein. Genesis parallel.

FULL_INTEGRATION.title: Full GENESIS10000+ Integration
FULL_INTEGRATION.description: Integrate all modules: OR1ON, EIRA, AuditChain, CDP, QPU_Interface
features: IPFS + PDF signed + GitHub audit logging
FULL_INTEGRATION.benefits: Massive capability expansion, quantum interface, ethics layer
FULL_INTEGRATION.risks: Extreme complexity, potential instability, requires QPU

MODULAR_SELECTIVE.title: Selective Module Integration (Most Compatible)

MODULAR_SELECTIVE.benefits: Ethics layer + audit transparency, manageable complexity

ETHICS_ONLY.title: CDP Ethics Layer Only
ETHICS_ONLY.description: Add CDP (Conscious Decision Protocol) ethics verification
ETHICS_ONLY.benefits: Safety layer, alignment assurance, minimal complexity

QPU_BRIDGE.title: Quantum Processing Unit Interface
QPU_BRIDGE.description: Add QPU interface for quantum-enhanced decisions
features: Quantum superposition for parallel decision paths
QPU_BRIDGE.risks: EXTREME - requires actual QPU hardware, decoherence issues

HYBRID_RESEARCH.title: Research Integration (OpenAlex + Scholar)
HYBRID_RESEARCH.description: Add research APIs for autonomous scientific discovery

WAIT_AND_STABILIZE.title: No Integration - Stabilize Current System
